summary: Vampire hunter Van Helsing returns to Transylvania to destroy handsome bloodsucker Baron Meinster, who has designs on beautiful young schoolteacher Marianne.
cast: Peter Cushing|Martita Hunt|Yvonne Monlaur|Freda Jackson|David Peel|Miles Malleson|Henry Oscar|Mona Washbourne|Andree Melly|Victor Brooks|Fred Johnson|Michael Ripper|Norman Pierce|Vera Cook|Marie Devereux|Ted Carroll|Susan Castle|Jill Haworth|Walter Henry|Michael Mulcaster|Harry Pringle|Harold Scott|Stephanie Watts
